%text Let there be two events - $A$ and $B$. If \underline\text{event B has already happened}, then
\[\qquad P\left( A\,\vert\,B \right) + P\left( A'\,\vert\, B\right) = 1 \]
The above simply says that if event $B$ has happened, then \underline\text{event $A$ has also} \underline\text{certainly happened or not happened}. %
